title: Computer crash
body: Anyone know whenever I turn on league in the next 30 seconds it crashes my computer, I dont have a bad computer im able to play games like Overwatch on high graphics I already reset my computer any ideas?

replies.body: The situation can vary depending on when exactly this is happening.  If the crash occurs after your match is loading then you may have recently updated Windows 10.  The [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) has been causing issues for some players, and disabling that may get this fixed up.  If this doesn't help, let me know with more information like where and what is happening _exactly_.  Let me know!
hey does this only applies to ppl who uses xbox game bar because  I don't use that and currently having trouble turning it off since I don't have a xbox account so I cant get to settings.
